items.sentence: I can vouch for Tom\'s work. He is really good at what he does.
I can\'t believe Tom and Mary have been together for ten years.
I wouldn\'t have been able to finish the job without your help.
I\'d like to call Tom and see if he can come visit me tomorrow.
From the look on your face, I can tell that you have good news.
He reached out his hand for the knife, but it was too far away.
Tom and Mary often had their morning coffee on the front porch.
Tom became interested in snowboarding when he was about twelve.
I don\'t know for certain whether Tom will sing tonight or not.
I think you and Tom have more in common than you want to admit.
